items.question: Who can join the vendor program?
items.answer: Independent ateliers, bespoke fashion houses, and design collectives producing made-to-measure garments with verified fulfillment capacity.

items.question: How long does onboarding take?
items.answer: Most teams launch in under 10 business days with help from our onboarding specialists and migration tools.

items.question: Can I integrate my existing tools?
items.answer: Yes. We connect directly with collaboration suites, shipping partners, and payment providers through turnkey integrations.
